extendedInfo.description: ** ANDROID 4.3 CONTAINS A SEVERE BUG THAT AFFECTS ANY APP THAT MONITORS THE CLIPBOARD. IF YOU ATTEMPT TO COPY ANYTHING THE APP WILL CRASH. GOOGLE IS AWARE OF THE ISSUE. CURRENTLY WAITING ON GOOGLE TO ROLL OUT THE FIX **** IF YOU ENJOY THIS APP PLEASE CHECK OUT MY NEWLY RELEASED FINANCE WIZARD APP  **** A donate ad free version is also available **Clipboard admin is a clipboard manager for Android. The application runs in the background saving all copied text into an SQL DB for later viewing and/or modification. A system tray icon is enabled for easy access while also displaying your most recent entry.Features:- Sort via alpha, oldest, newest, modified date- Create and sort by favorites- Export to SD- Share- Edit/delete clipping- Copy existing clippings- Add custom clippings- Delete entire db in one go- Backup/restore db- Widget

reviews.title: Very Good
